Name: Canh Can Trang
Steps: 1. Boil 4 cups of water with 2 tbsp of chicken broth powder, onions and green onions.
2. Cut Napa Cabbage to bite sizes pieces.
3. Clean and de-vein the shrimp. Cut the shrimp into halves.
4. When the Broth is boiling add in shrimp.
5. Wait for the water to boil again, add in the the cabbage.
6. Turn off the heat and add parsley in.

Name: Thit Kho
Steps: 2. Add the chopped up pork belly. Add lemongrass, fish sauce, caramel, and sugar
3. Sauté until golden brown. Add 1/4 cup of water and cook until the water reduces into a sauce.
4. Add oyster sauce at the end and turn off the heat
